get.description: Retrieves all categories in Spreaker

parameters.name: episode_id
parameters.description: The unique episode id.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The id of the image to set to the episode. The image must be uploaded before using it (see Upload an image) and must belong to episode authors images storage.

delete.description: Deletes an episode. Theres no way to recover a deleted episode.

parameters.name: episode_id
parameters.description: The unique episode id.

parameters.description: Episode category

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Episode description, max length 10k chars

get.description: Get Episode Media List

get.description: Retrieves all live episodes at the moment of the request

parameters.name: show_id

get.description: This API returns information and items of a specific category. The response contains two properties at root level:

parameters.name: explore_category
parameters.description: contains category information, the exact same information exported by /explore/categories API

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: contains a sorted list of shows or episodes, depending on the category type (type 1 and 3 contain episodes, type 2 contains shows)

post.description: Upload a new Media in the specified user library

parameters.name: Filedata
parameters.description: The file to upload, encoded multipart/form-data

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The media length in milliseconds. It will be autodetected is missing. The real length will be calculated while encoding either if this property is specified.

parameters.name: style_id
parameters.description: The music style associated to this media. Can be only a Style supported by Spreaker

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The media type: can be one of SONG, JINGLE, LOOP, UNKNOWN, EFFECT, EPISODE

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique user id.

get.description: Get a paginated list of media owned by <user_id> filtered by type:.

parameters.name: sort_col
parameters.description: The column upon which the results are sorted. Accepted values: name, created_at

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: The direction of sorting. Accepted values: ASC, DESC

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

get.description: This API allows to find shows.

parameters.description: Search query

delete.description: Deletes a show. Theres no way to recover a deleted show. Only show without episodes in it can be deleted.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Show description

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Shows email contact

parameters.name: facebook_url
parameters.description: Shows facebook page url

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: The show id.

parameters.name: skype_name
parameters.description: Shows skypy account name

parameters.name: sms_number
parameters.description: Shows sms number (eg. numer to text to)

parameters.name: tel_number
parameters.description: Shows telephone number (eg. number to call for interviews)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Show title

parameters.name: twitter_name
parameters.description: Shows twitter account name

parameters.name: website_url
parameters.description: Shows website url

get.description: Retrieves all listenable episodes by show (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Episode category

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Episode description

parameters.name: download_enabled
parameters.description: Enable / disable download (defaults to true)

parameters.name: explicit
parameters.description: True if the episode contains explicit content (defaults to false)

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: True if the episode should be private (defaults to false)

parameters.name: media_id
parameters.description: The single media_id or ordered list of media_id that compose the episode

parameters.name: shares
parameters.description: The channels on which this episode has to be shared.

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: Unique show id.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Episode tags (comma separated)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Episode title

get.description: Retrieves all episodes by show (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: The unique show id.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Show title. Min length: 5. Max length: 40

get.description: Get List of Followers

parameters.name: followed_id
parameters.description: Allows the authenticating user to follow the user specified in the <followed_id> parameter.

get.description: Get List of Following
Retrieves an user by unique identifier.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

put.description: Edit user info (eg. fullname, description aka biography, gender, birthday, ...).

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: User biography, max length 180 chars

parameters.name: fullname
parameters.description: User fullname, max length 30 chars

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: User gender: can be MALE or FEMALE

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

get.description: Retrieves the user actions settings

parameters.name: EPISODE_BROADCAST
parameters.description: The user has published a new episode ( either live or podcast )

parameters.name: FACEBOOK
parameters.description: The user wants to share on facebook the specified action

parameters.name: RADIO_FOLLOW
parameters.description: The user starts following a radio

parameters.name: RADIO_MESSAGE
parameters.description: The user has sent a message to a radio

parameters.name: SHOW_FOLLOW
parameters.description: The user starts following a show

parameters.name: SHOW_MESSAGE
parameters.description: The user has sent a message to a show

parameters.name: TWITTER
parameters.description: The user wants to share on twitter the specified action

parameters.name: USER_FOLLOW
parameters.description: The user starts following another user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

get.description: Edit facebook share settings.

parameters.name: EPISODE_BROADCAST
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user has published a new episode, off otherwise

parameters.name: RADIO_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following a radio, off otherwise

parameters.name: RADIO_MESSAGE
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user has sent a message to a radio, off otherwise

parameters.name: SHOW_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following a show, off otherwise

parameters.name: SHOW_MESSAGE
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user has sent a message to a show, off otherwise

parameters.name: USER_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following another user, off otherwise

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

parameters.name: EPISODE_BROADCAST
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user has published a new episode, off otherwise

parameters.name: RADIO_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following a radio, off otherwise

parameters.name: SHOW_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following a show, off otherwise

parameters.name: USER_FOLLOW
parameters.description: on to enable sharing when the user starts following another user, off otherwise

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

get.description: Retrieves all listenable episodes by user (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

parameters.description: Users id.

get.description: This API returns a list of newsfeed items. The request MUST be authenticated (an user can only fetch its own newsfeed).

parameters.name: last_id
parameters.description: The last newsfeed item received in the previous request, so that this request will contains immediately subsequent items

parameters.name: max_per_page
parameters.description: Max number of items in the response

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id.

parameters.description: The user id.
